title: Hiding in Plain Sight
strapline: Discovering the lost cinemas of Leeds
welcome_message:
So far we’ve uncovered $number cinemas in Leeds. The majority no longer operate, but evidence of many remains – you just need to know where to look.

 Use the map or list to learn about each cinema and add your memories. If there’s anything we’ve missed we want to know – we want the list to keep growing!
